info.name: Billing API
info.description:
# Billing Management API

## Overview
A comprehensive API for managing billing operations, including:
- Invoice generation
- Payment processing
- Subscription management
- Billing history
- Payment method management

## Authentication
All endpoints require Bearer Token authentication.

## Error Handling
The API uses standard HTTP status codes and provides detailed error responses.

## Contact Information
- **Support Email**: billing-support@example.com
- **Support Phone**: +1-800-BILLING
